Five years already fm grand open in 2019.
Our Thai company is currently running well with excellent service. EVEROK has excellent local employees in Thailand…
data.text:
A visit to Westport, Klang in Malaysia. Ports play a major role in the economic and social development of countries. Port Klang - the 12th largest port in the world and the 2nd largest in Southeast Asia in terms of TEU (Twenty-foot Equivalent Unit). Malaysia is truly blessed with its strategic location along the Malacca Straits, one of the most important and busiest shipping lanes in the world for global trade. An estimated one-third of the world's containerized cargo passes through the Strait each year. Ports often spur the growth of industrial development and the establishment of free trade zones in their vicinity. These developments benefit from proximity to the port, reducing transportation costs and improving supply chain efficiency. #industrial

Mediterranean Shipping Company (MSC) is expanding its service offerings in the Philippines, introducing three new weekly calls in Manila North Harbor and launching an inaugural service to Davao. The new service offerings support the expansion of local businesses by directly connecting the Philippines with major global trade centers through reliable services at competitive transit times, the company said in a statement. The New Origami, Kaguya and Lang Co services now provide three new weekly calls in Manila North Harbor, increasing coverage by directly connecting Manila with Southeast Asia and South China. Source: PortCalls Asia Follow us for all things logistics 🌎 Subscribe to our newsletter 🗞️ Weekly updates 👍 Link in Bio 🌐 #Logistics #Shipping #Freight #SupplyChain #Transportation #Cargo #Warehousing #Distribution #LogisticsManagement #Transport #SupplyChainManagement #CargoHandling #WarehousingSolutions #LogisticsCompany #Delivery #Inventory #Trucking #InternationalShipping #GlobalShipping #ShippingIndustry

AGIL - Israel Declares State of Emergency and War, International Flights Suspended, Cargo Services Uncertain ---------------------------------- ------------------------------- What is happening?: ------------------------------- check the following KWE Corporate Posts. https://www.kwe.com/ https://www.kwe.com/news/ https://lnkd.in/gNggRMMd https://lnkd.in/gNJfteMy ------------------------------- Affected Country: ------------------------------- Israel - AGIL - Allcargo ------------------------------- Affected Airport/Port: ------------------------------- Tel Aviv - AIRFREIGHT Ashdod & Haifa - SEAFREIGHT ------------------------------- Affected facility or services: ------------------------------- OPERATIONS in ISRAEL - please contact your local sales representative. ------------------------------- Impact to Customer Details: ------------------------------- Israel have announced a 48-hour state of emergency and have declared war. As of October 9th, Europe, US, and Asia based carriers to and from Israel have suspended flights. The Israel Airports Authority has announced Tel Aviv and Ramon airport are to remain open. However, due to the uncertain developments, KWE may not be able to accept cargo to and from Israel. The situation is being closely monitored by KWE to mitigate the impact on scheduling. Please refer to this page for further developments. For any further updates please contact your local operations or sales representative. ------------------------------- Contact person/s: ------------------------------- please contact your local operations or sales representative.

Focus on logistics newsletter-Effective in early March! YML's route has changed? Yangming Shipping (YML) recently announced that it will jointly launch a new route JAPAN KANSAI service (JKX) in Asia with its partners in early March, and each party will deploy a ship for joint venture. This is also a major measure for Yangming to continuously optimize the market layout in Northeast Asia and continuously strengthen the route service in Japan. The JKX route is destined for Osaka, Kobe, Pusan, Keelung, Kaohsiung, Hong Kong, Shekou, Xiamen and Osaka for a total of 14 days. In addition, Yangming will adjust the JTS route from the beginning of March to improve its competitiveness, and this route is operated independently by Yangming. More details read: Focus-on-logistics-newsletter-Effective-in-early-March-YML-s-route-has-changed - XDY Forwarder.

Did you know that Malaysia boasts a total of 65,877 kilometers of highway roads, which exceeds the Earth's circumference of 40,075 kilometers? Or that it is home to the largest roundabout in the world? These facts were new to me until the COREX Logistics team and I started actively planning projects there. In our exploration of potential logistical options, we discovered some fascinating aspects: Malaysia has well-developed transport links in the western part (Peninsular Malaysia). However, the eastern part (East Malaysia – Sabah and Sarawak) features several hard-to-reach areas. Nonetheless, this does not deter COREX; we are fully capable of reaching these locations. Furthermore, we are equipped to offer cargo delivery under various temperature conditions to any area within this extraordinary country. To be honest, I was already familiar with a few facts about this wonderful country from my travels there several years ago. For example, the renowned shoe designer Jimmy Choo hails from Malaysia. Do you have any interesting facts about Malaysia? Please share them in the comments!

#didyoucheckwithGOPET? Intermodal connections from Türkiye to Europe with GOPET. 𝗟𝗼𝗼𝗸𝗶𝗻𝗴 𝗳𝗼𝗿 𝗮 𝗿𝗲𝗹𝗶𝗮𝗯𝗹𝗲 𝗮𝗻𝗱 𝗲𝗳𝗳𝗶𝗰𝗶𝗲𝗻𝘁 𝘄𝗮𝘆 𝘁𝗼 𝘁𝗿𝗮𝗻𝘀𝗽𝗼𝗿𝘁 𝘆𝗼𝘂𝗿 𝗴𝗼𝗼𝗱𝘀 𝗳𝗿𝗼𝗺 𝗛𝗮𝗹𝗸𝗮𝗹ı 𝘁𝗼 𝗕𝗶𝗹𝗸, 𝗛𝘂𝗻𝗴𝗮𝗿𝘆? Look no further! 𝗥𝗲𝗹𝗶𝗮𝗯𝗹𝗲 𝗦𝗰𝗵𝗲𝗱𝘂𝗹𝗲: Benefit from 2 to 3 weekly train services departing from Halkalı Terminal, ensuring consistent and timely deliveries. Trains typically operate on Mondays, Thursdays, and Saturdays. 𝗘𝗳𝗳𝗶𝗰𝗶𝗲𝗻𝘁 𝗧𝗿𝗮𝗻𝘀𝗶𝘁: In just 5 days, your cargo will reach Bilk Terminal, providing expedited access to your Hungarian destinations. 𝗙𝗹𝗲𝘅𝗶𝗯𝗹𝗲 𝗖𝗮𝗽𝗮𝗰𝗶𝘁𝘆: Our service adapts to your needs – the number of trips can increase based on demand, ensuring you never face capacity constraints. 𝗥𝗲𝗹𝗶𝗮𝗯𝗹𝗲 𝗧𝗿𝗮𝗻𝘀𝗽𝗼𝗿𝘁: Rely on our secure and dependable intermodal transportation solutions, meticulously crafted to meet your logistical needs. 𝗖𝗼𝗻𝗻𝗲𝗰𝘁𝗶𝗻𝗴 𝗘𝘂𝗿𝗼𝗽𝗲: This route is part of our extensive intermodal network, offering seamless connections to multiple European destinations. For inquiries and bookings, contact us today at hello@gopettrans.com Your cargo's journey to Bilk may start here. #IntermodalTransport #HalkalıToBilk #LogisticsSolutions
